title: “Pump Up The Spice” - Food in D&D
itunes:title: “Pump Up The Spice” - Food in D&D
description:
This week we meet in a tavern to discuss a favourite topic amongst us Halflings … FOOD! We’re tucking into the cultural importance of food, its depiction in fantasy and how food manifests in D&D. Plus, Unati shows off her chef feat with a sprinkling of recipes.

If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing it with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord, or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
